frameDefinitions: In this frame a Source_emitter discharges its Emission along a Path or to a Goal.  ' (1)
The speaker believes that some state of affairs or entity (the Requirement) must be present in order to cause some other dependent state of affairs to occur (the Dependent).
An Entity began its existence in the context of a Origin, which can be a place,  culture, time period, text, etc.
An Experiencer has an easy or difficult time carrying out an Activity.
The obtaining of a Requirement state of affairs or the presence of a Required_entity is profiled as a prerequisite for the obtaining or occurring of a Dependent state-of-affairs.
A Dependent state-of-affairs has a Requirement as a prerequisite for obtaining or occurring.
frameExamples: (1) The factory <t>exudes</t> toxic fumes from three large chimneys.
The Christian <t>origin</t> of this quote is from Isaiah 22.
The atomic bombings were probably not <t>necessary</t> to win WWII without a mainland invasion of Japan.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Source_emitter</fen> is the item  from which the <fen>Emission</fen> are discharged.
The <fen>Emission</fen>s are discharged out of the <fen>Source_emitter</fen> .
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when  the <fen>Source_emitter</fen> emits the <fen>Emission</fen>.
The Cognizer requires or believes he/she requires the Requirement to hold so that the Dependent will occur.
The entity or state-of-affairs that must be present or obtain in order for the Dependent to obtain.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
An undesirable state-of-affairs that results if the <fen>Requirement</fen> is not met.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> requires the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The location of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> when he/she requires the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The item whose <fen>Origin</fen> is under discussion.
The place or culture where the <fen>Entity</fen> was produced.

This Frame Element marks expressions indicating the <fen>Activity</fen> that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> finds difficult or easy. In many cases, the relevant <fen>Activity</fen> has to be inferred from the context.
This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate which person judges carrying out the <fen>Activity</fen> to be easy or difficult.
The time at which the <fen>Activity</fen> takes place.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the state of affairs of the <fen>Requirement</fen> or the presence of the <fen>Required_entity</fen>.
The state-of-affairs that must obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.
An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain.
The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.
<fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The entity or state-of-affairs that must be present or obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.
An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain.
The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.
<fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds.
listRoleExamples: He needs to focus on his schoolwork, <fex>or he's not going to pass the third grade</fex>.
<fex>Over at Merv's house</fex> they need three more cement trucks to finish the job.
The geology question on the exam was hard <fex>for me</fex>.
Believe it or not, but this cake requires <fex>a pound of mild sausage</fex>.
<fex>In the US</fex>, putting this on the agenda requires the political weight and leadership of big city mayors.
<fex>In the US</fex>, the political clout of big city mayors is necessary to put this on the national agenda.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases
